rooms.description: Open-plan living area with floor-to-ceiling windows on the north and south facades, designed to maximize natural light and adhere to Vastu principles for harmony.
Seamlessly integrated dining area adjacent to the open-plan living and kitchen, ensuring ease of movement and conversation.
Modern, Scandinavian inspired open-plan kitchen with integrated storage solutions and energy-efficient appliances, positioned to capture natural light.
Master bedroom with a private balcony, featuring a quiet location to the east for positive energy flow in accordance with Vastu principles.
Additional bedroom ensuring sufficient privacy and quiet atmosphere, positioned on the west side to balance energy.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window in the north facade for abundant natural light.
Floor-to-ceiling window on the south side to enhance ventilation and natural lighting.

notes: The design adheres to local building norms, ensuring structural stability for a triplex 5BHK bungalow.
Scandinavian elements such as minimalistic interiors, clean lines, and functional aesthetics are integrated with Vastu guidelines.
Open-plan kitchen and living area foster modern living while ensuring luxury segment appeal.
